description: Returns a list of all valid regions for Amazon Lightsail. Use the include availability zones parameter to also return the Availability Zones in a region.

nested_items.name: regions
nested_items.description: An array of key-value pairs containing information about your get regions request.

nested_items.name: continentCode
nested_items.description: The continent code ( NA, meaning North America).

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the Amazon Web Services Region ( This region is recommended to serve users in the eastern United States and eastern Canada).

nested_items.name: availabilityZones
nested_items.description: The Availability Zones. Follows the format us-east-2a (case-sensitive).

nested_items.name: zoneName
nested_items.description: The name of the Availability Zone. The format is us-east-2a (case-sensitive).

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: The state of the Availability Zone.

nested_items.name: relationalDatabaseAvailabilityZones
nested_items.description: The Availability Zones for databases. Follows the format us-east-2a (case-sensitive).

nested_items.name: zoneName
nested_items.description: The name of the Availability Zone. The format is us-east-2a (case-sensitive).

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: The state of the Availability Zone.
